UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The combination of Neosartorya (Aspergillus) fischeri antifungal proteins with rationally designed γ-core peptide derivatives is effective for plant and crop protection
Literature.Author: Tóth L, Poór P, Ördög A, Váradi G, Farkas A, Papp C, Bende G, Tóth GK, Rákhely G, Marx F, Galgóczy L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aspergillus flavus SZMC 3014(MIC=>200µg/ml),Aspergillus niger SZMC 0145(MIC=>200µg/ml),Aspergillus welwitschiae SZMC 21832(MIC=>200µg/ml),Botrytis cinerea SZMC 21474(MIC=200µg/ml),Botrytis pseudocinerea SZMC 21470(MIC=50µg/ml),Cladosporium herbarum FSU 1148(MIC=100µg/ml),Fusarium boothii CBS 110250(MIC=>200µg/ml),Fusarium graminearum SZMC 6236J(MIC=>200µg/ml),Fusarium oxysporum SZMC 6237J(MIC=>200µg/ml),Fusarium solani CBS 115659(MIC=50µg/ml),Fusarium solani CBS 119996(MIC=200µg/ml),Aspergillus flavus SZMC 20745(MIC=>200µg/ml),Botrytis cinerea SZMC 21472(MIC=200µg/ml)
